title: Venetian Hotel - Canyon Ranch Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. On the 4th floor of the Venetian Hotel, at the Canyon Ranch SpaClub, this restaurant features organic food and healthier cuisine with ingredients labeled. Has a vegan tofu tomato and spinach sandwich, vegetarian flatbread with pesto (ask if contains dairy), a 3-course fix menu for around $17-20, and others.
